author: missneona
title: Quantum Collective Community Hub
description: How can users find, be found, connect and realize where they fit and are needed by their neighbours? Self-govenment by data rewarding + use?
solution: Toolsets and pathways to use Thunder Bay, Ontario as a pilot project for community-led self governance structre, mentoring and a sub-economy
experience: The team is comprised of entrepreneurs, researchers, developers, mentors, inspired creators, gamers, crypto-enthusiasts, musicians and you?
